mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT p.perm_name FROM user_roles ur JOIN role_permissions rp ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id JOIN permissions p ON p.id = rp.perm_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.perm_name
SELECT DISTINCT r.role_name FROM user_roles ur JOIN roles r ON r.id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY r.role_name
